ui = m00*xi+m01*yi+m02*599.44+m03/(m20*xi+m21*yi+m22*599.44+m23)

81 = (m02*599.44+m03)/(m22*599.44+m23)
97 = (m00*22.23+m01*22.23+m02*599.44+m03)/(m20*22.23+m21*22.23+m22*599.44+m23)
113 = (m00*44.45+m01*44.45+m02*599.44+m03)/(m20*44.45+m21*44.45+m22*599.44+m23)
129 = (m00*66.68+m01*66.68+m02*599.44+m03)/(m20*66.68+m21*66.68+m22*599.44+m23)
146 = (m00*88.9+m01*88.9+m02*599.44+m03)/(m20*88.9+m21*88.9+m22*599.44+m23)
163 = (m00*111.13+m01*111.13+m02*599.44+m03)/(m20*111.13+m21*111.13+m22*599.44+m23)
#
vi = m10*xi+m11*yi+m12*599.44+m13/(m20*xi+m21*yi+m22*599.44+m23)

87 = (m12*599.44+m13)/(m22*599.44+m23)
103 = (m10*22.23+m11*22.23+m12*599.44+m13)/(m20*22.23+m21*22.23+m22*599.44+m23)
119 = (m10*44.45+m11*44.45+m12*599.44+m13)/(m20*44.45+m21*44.45+m22*599.44+m23)
135 = (m10*66.68+m11*66.68+m12*599.44+m13)/(m20*66.68+m21*66.68+m22*599.44+m23)
152 = (m10*88.9+m11*88.9+m12*599.44+m13)/(m20*88.9+m21*88.9+m22*599.44+m23)
168 = (m10*111.13+m11*111.13+m12*599.44+m13)/(m20*111.13+m21*111.13+m22*599.44+m23)


syms m00 m01 m02 m03 m10 m11 m12 m13 m20 m21 m22 m23

eqn1 = 81 == (m02*599.44+m03)/(m22*599.44+m23)
eqn2 = 97 == (m00*22.23+m01*22.23+m02*599.44+m03)/(m20*22.23+m21*22.23+m22*599.44+m23)
eqn3 = 113 == (m00*44.45+m01*44.45+m02*599.44+m03)/(m20*44.45+m21*44.45+m22*599.44+m23)
eqn4 = 129 == (m00*66.68+m01*66.68+m02*599.44+m03)/(m20*66.68+m21*66.68+m22*599.44+m23)
eqn5 = 146 == (m00*88.9+m01*88.9+m02*599.44+m03)/(m20*88.9+m21*88.9+m22*599.44+m23)
eqn6 = 163 == (m00*111.13+m01*111.13+m02*599.44+m03)/(m20*111.13+m21*111.13+m22*599.44+m23)
eqn7 = 87 == (m12*599.44+m13)/(m22*599.44+m23)
eqn8 = 103 == (m10*22.23+m11*22.23+m12*599.44+m13)/(m20*22.23+m21*22.23+m22*599.44+m23)
eqn9 = 119 == (m10*44.45+m11*44.45+m12*599.44+m13)/(m20*44.45+m21*44.45+m22*599.44+m23)
eqn10 = 135 == (m10*66.68+m11*66.68+m12*599.44+m13)/(m20*66.68+m21*66.68+m22*599.44+m23)
eqn11 = 152 == (m10*88.9+m11*88.9+m12*599.44+m13)/(m20*88.9+m21*88.9+m22*599.44+m23)
eqn12 = 168 == (m10*111.13+m11*111.13+m12*599.44+m13)/(m20*111.13+m21*111.13+m22*599.44+m23)

equationsToMatrix([eqn1, eqn2, eqn3,eqn4,eqn5,eqn6,eqn7,eqn8,eqn9,eqn10,eqn11,eqn12], [m00, m01, m02, m03, m10, m11, m12, m13, m20, m21, m22, m23])


------
syms m00 m01 m02 m03 m10 m11 m12 m13 m20 m21 m22 m23

eqn1 = 0 == m02*599.44+m03 - 81*599.44*m22-81*m23
eqn2 = 0 == 22.23*m00+22.23*m01+599.44*m02+m03-97*22.23*m20-97*22.23*m21-97*599.44*m22-97*m23
eqn3 = 0 == 44.45*m00+44.45*m01+599.44*m02+m03-113*44.45*m20-113*44.45*m21-113*599.44*m22-113*m23
eqn4 = 0 == 66.68*m00+66.68*m01+599.44*m02+m03-129*66.68*m20-129*66.68*m21-129*599.44*m22-129*m23
eqn5 = 0 == 88.9*m00+88.9*m01+599.44*m02+m03-146*88.9*m20-146*88.9*m21-146*599.44*m22-146*m23
eqn6 = 0 == 111.13*m00+111.13*m01+599.44*m02+m03-163*111.13*m20-163*111.13*m21-163*599.44*m22-163*m23
eqn7 = 0 == 599.44*m12+m13-87*599.44*m22-87*m23
eqn8 = 0 == 22.23*m10+22.23*m11+599.44*m12+m13-103*22.23*m20-103*22.23*m21-103*599.44*m22-103*m23
eqn9 = 0 == 44.45*m10+44.45*m11+599.44*m12+m13-119*44.45*m20-119*44.45*m21-119*599.44*m22-119*m23
eqn10 = 0 == 66.68*m10+66.68*m11+599.44*m12+m13-135*66.68*m20-135*66.68*m21-135*599.44*m22-135*m23
eqn11 = 0 == 88.9*m10+88.9*m11+599.44*m12+m13-152*88.9*m20-152*88.9*m21-152*599.44*m22-152*m23
eqn12 = 0 == 111.13*m10+111.13*m11+599.44*m12+m13-168*111.13*m20-168*111.13*m21-168*599.44*m22-168*m23

[A,B] = equationsToMatrix([eqn1, eqn2, eqn3,eqn4,eqn5,eqn6,eqn7,eqn8,eqn9,eqn10,eqn11,eqn12], [m00, m01, m02, m03, m10, m11, m12, m13, m20, m21, m22, m23])

X = linsolve(A,B)
